home.title: Alejandro Canals
home.subtitle: Junior FullStack Developer
home.description: I am a passionate self-taught programmer, committed to continuous learning and creative problem solving.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Currently, I work as a junior full-stack developer in a company, where I work with technologies such as PHP, JavaScript, SQL, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap, as well as platforms like WordPress and PrestaShop.
about.description2: In my free time, I continue expanding my knowledge in React Native and Node.js, developing personal projects to improve my skills and explore new technologies.

electronics.title: Electronic Repairs
electronics.description1: Besides programming, I've always been passionate about hardware and electronics
electronics.description2: During my time as a Technician, I worked repairing devices such as mobile phones, tablets and computers, gaining experience in fault diagnosis, component soldering and parts replacement.
electronics.description3: During that time, I also carried out various personal projects modifying and repairing devices, such as mechanical keyboards, consoles and gadgets.
